statements: DELETE FROM customer_reports WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customer_reports WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customer_reports WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customer_reports WHERE preference = 'Sports' OR buying_behavior = 'Online Shopping';
DELETE FROM customer_reports WHERE address LIKE '%New York%' AND buying_behavior = 'Online Shopping';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE product_name IN ('Shirt', 'Pants', 'Shoes') AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female'
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York')
DELETE FROM customer_buying_behavior WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 30)
DELETE FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Monthly Report';
